error_events.description: Safety issue detected: [UNVERIFIABLE. Loss of visibility prevents safety monitoring.]

error_events.description: Safety issue detected: WARNING: Beverage can (food/drink) detected on the desk in the immediate vicinity of the control interface. This violates standard laboratory safety protocols and poses a contamination risk.
error_events.actual_state: WARNING: Beverage can (food/drink) detected on the desk in the immediate vicinity of the control interface. This violates standard laboratory safety protocols and poses a contamination risk.

error_events.description: Safety issue detected: CRITICAL: The inability to visually monitor the liquid handler workspace represents a critical safety failure. The system's own logs confirm: "HIGH ERROR: SAFETY_CONCERN" and "Loss of visibility prevents safety monitoring."
error_events.actual_state: CRITICAL: The inability to visually monitor the liquid handler workspace represents a critical safety failure. The system's own logs confirm: "HIGH ERROR: SAFETY_CONCERN" and "Loss of visibility prevents safety monitoring."

error_events.description: Safety issue detected: CRITICAL. The inability to visually monitor the equipment is a critical safety issue. The operator cannot observe potential spills, contamination, or other physical hazards on the robot deck.
error_events.actual_state: CRITICAL. The inability to visually monitor the equipment is a critical safety issue. The operator cannot observe potential spills, contamination, or other physical hazards on the robot deck.
